cast.overview: Dr. John Markway invites three distinct individuals to the eerie and isolated Hill House to be subjects for a sleep disorder study. The unfortunate guests discover that Markway is far more interested in the sinister mansion itself — and they soon see the true nature of its horror.
cast.title: The Haunting

details.biography: Susan Richards was born on 6 August 1898 in Blaenau Ffestiniog, Merionethshire, Wales, UK. She was an actress, known for The Lady of the Camellias (1976), The Wednesday Play (1964) and Village of the Damned (1960). She died on 24 December 1986 in Lee-on-the-Solent, Hampshire, England, UK.
details.name: Susan Richards
